span.p:
Linear Adapter
input→768
For Image: input=512
For Text: input=768

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
MLP Adapter
input→2048→1024→768
For Image: input=512
For Text: input=768

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Image
e.g., photo of a dog

span.p:
''How similar are
image and text?''
(dot product ÷ 0.07)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Make matching pairs similar
''Repel non-matching pairs''
(with 0.1 label smoothing)
